channel.title: Machine Learning on Wyatt Johnston
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Wyatt Johnston

item.title: Making a Machine Learning Model for Tennis Betting Part 1: The Model
item.description: Creating a machine learning model that predicts tennis matches efficiently enough to bet on them profitably.

item.title: HRV and the WHOOP Recovery Model: Estimating Feature Importance
item.description: Heart rate variability (HRV) is the primary metric that the WHOOP fitness band uses to calculate your recovery. In this article I look at just how much HRV contributes to recovery, plus how a high HRV variance can make things tricky.
